comment.text: Information is based on database description. Actual diagnose is missing
Recurrent bronchiolitis and bronchopneumonia, meningitis, glomerulonephritis, hypogammaglobulinemia, seven-month history of hematuria

consequence.term: a frame shift duplication mutation in the exon 6 leading to a premature stop codon in the CP domain

comment.text: Information is based on database description. Actual diagnose is missing
Otitis media, sinusitis, pharyngitis, four bouts of pneumonia, bacterial conjunctivitis and chronic gastritis (Heliobacter pylori infection), hypogammaglobulinemia

consequence.term: a frame shift deletion mutation in the exon 11 leading to a premature stop codon in the CP domain

comment.text: Information is based on database description. Actual diagnose is missing

Otitis media, sinusitis, pharyngitis, hypogammaglobulinemia, recurrent upper respiratory tract infections, pneumonia, herpes zoster, recurrent bacterial conjunctivitis with dacryocystitis and diarrhea

consequence.term: a frame shift deletion mutation in the exon 11 leading to a premature stop codon in the CP domain

comment.text: Information is based on database description. Actual diagnose is missing

Otitis media, sinusitis, pharyngitis, hypogammaglobulinemia, recurrent upper respiratory tract infections, pneumonia, recurrent skin abscesses, chronic diarrhea, bronchitis, and recurrent bacterial conjunctivitis

consequence.term: a frame shift deletion mutation in the exon 11 leading to a premature stop codon in the CP domain
